dict.acceptation: 容量；才能；性能；生产能力；

sent.orig: The labour capacity of mine enterprise consists of value labour capacity and real object labour capacity.
sent.trans: 矿山企业劳动生产率由价值劳动生产率和实物劳动生产率组成。

sent.orig: Theseelements include Carrying Capacity, which comprising supportive capacity andassimilative capacity, Regulating Ability, Loading and Regional RCS.
sent.trans: 这些要素包括区域承载力涉及的支撑能力及同化能力、调节能力及区域承载量。

sent.orig: It defines such basic concepts as capacity-oriented management, capacity, and capacity principal.
sent.trans: 建立了“能本管理”的基本概念，对能力、能力本位等基本概念作了必要的界定。

sent.orig: As a concrete capacity, the legal capacity of legal person can be restricted.
sent.trans: 由于与自然人的实体基础不同，法人的权利能力受到自然性质的限制。

sent.orig: Expand latent capacity: Have abundant capital actual strength, development latent capacity nots allow small inspect.
sent.trans: 发展潜力：具有雄厚的资金实力，发展潜力不容小视。
